This game is extremely fun, unlike other games, it seamlessly combines practice and fun together, crafting a unique experience where you have fun at all skill levels. The developers do occasionally make mistakes in balancing, but that is to be expected from all games. Getting burnt out on the game is possible, however it becomes harder as they add more finely tuned killers to the game, except for Ghostface and Spirit, those killers suck to play against. All in all i give this game an 8/10, because it still has room for improvement

This game is all of abusable stuffs in it. It's in favor of killer. You don't have fun while playing one of the survivors. It is unbalanced. As I see they never try balancing it. The developers just itches their private parts and saying 'hahaha look at the sales. All the degenerate kids buying this game and abusing the killer mechanics.' I'm pretty sure none of the developers have played as a survivor. What I suggest is to kill theirselves and delete this game on the planet earth. It's not worth a single cent of the money i gave it to.

It's a fun game if you don't want to take it seriously. Easy to pick up if you watch some youtube videos on it, but damn hard to master. Also, competitively is very poorly balanced, and prone to bugs and glitches. Worth picking up, but probably not something you'll end up putting a lot of time into if your not already into it.
Nice game to play. Positive vibes
